name: Smiling Face with Heart-Eyes
baseMeaning: A yellow face with an open smile and hearts for eyes.
tldr: Shows love, adoration, or being smitten. Can be romantic or for anything you love.

contextMeanings.meaning: Expressing love, admiration, or strong attraction.
Showing romantic interest or attraction to someone.
Loving something non-romantic like food, pets, or objects.
May seem too personal or romantic for professional contexts.

platformNotes.note: Very common in comments expressing admiration for photos.
Used to express love for content, creators, or trends.
Use cautiously - may seem unprofessional or overly familiar.

generationalNotes.note: Commonly used for both romantic and non-romantic admiration.
Standard emoji for expressing love or attraction.
May reserve for romantic contexts only.
